label: How much I hate what I'm doing?

description.min: you hate every single thing you're doing
description.max: you save the world, while doing something satisfying... and you think the world is worth saving

label: How much I destroy my body at work?

description.general: Even if it should be taken care of at a society level
description.min: You fight bears bear hands for a living
description.max: All your wall office are made of fluffy duvet, there's no angles anywhere and you exercices from times to times

label: How much pain I get from doing my job?

description.general: Pain could be effort, sweating, waiting in the cold or anything non pleasant and not damageable
description.min: Slowly cooking while shoveling coal and being slapped in the face every 30 minutes
description.max: You're in an quiet, air conditioned office

label: How much I'm emotionally impacted by my work?

description.general: How much of your mental workload you bring home
description.min: You're paid by the hour and don't care and nobody does either
description.max: President of a country at war, who cares about people

label: How much value I bring with my work?

description.general: The value created by your work : how many and how much people take advantage of your work
description.min: Somehow your job is to destroy usefull stuff
description.max: You're single handedly inventing clean, unlimited free energy

description.general: How easily you can be replaced by someone else
description.min: You're at primary school student : can walk and speak
description.max: There's 3 people in the world who can do what you do

label: How much I sacrificed to train my skills?

description.max: you had to give up your life and the one of your kids to eat only noodles and mustard for 3 years
description.general: You don't get points if your scholarship was paid for and you enjoyed your studies
